short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for scraping tweets on Twitter pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweet Scraper is a simple Chrome extension designed to help you effortlessly extract and organize tweet data. This tool enables users to collect essential information from tweets—such as content, user details, date, and links. You can easily set a tweet limit, view real-time scraping progress, and download your collected data in JSON format for further analysis.

With additional options to save only original tweets and avoid ads, Twitter Scraper offers a customizable and precise data collection experience, perfect for researchers, social media analysts, and digital marketers. Plus, you can support the extension’s continued development by donating through the built-in PayPal link.

Key Features:

-Collect tweet content, user info, date, links, and status ID.
-Filter out retweets and ads for a more focused dataset.
-Download data in JSON format for easy processing.
-Simple interface with customizable scraping options and limits.
-Built-in support option via PayPal donation link.
